Section Header: The following questions are about transitioning to online learning due to the pandemic

Section Header:
The following questions are used to assess signs of ongoing depression (adapted from PHQ-9). 

During the lockdown due to COVID19, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
Field Label: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Several days | 3, More than half the days | 4, Nearly every day

Field Label: Feeling down, depressed or hopeless
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Several days | 3, More than half the days | 4, Nearly every day

Field Label: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Several days | 3, More than half the days | 4, Nearly every day

Field Label: Feeling tired or having little energy
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Several days | 3, More than half the days | 4, Nearly every day

Field Label: Poor appetite or overeating
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Several days | 3, More than half the days | 4, Nearly every day

Field Label: Feeling bad about yourself- or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Several days | 3, More than half the days | 4, Nearly every day

Field Label: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Several days | 3, More than half the days | 4, Nearly every day

Field Label: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Several days | 3, More than half the days | 4, Nearly every day

Field Label: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or hurting yourself in some way
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Several days | 3, More than half the days | 4, Nearly every day

Field Label: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not difficult at all | 1, Somewhat difficult | 2, Very difficult | 3, Extremely difficult | 4, N/A (I did not check off any problems)
